Prefect Vokian: Very well! Then I, Prefect Vokian, will give you an order! Defeat these evil creatures and return with proof of your deed. There is Manashen, described as "a stone statue that crosses the sky" near the Ivory Tower of Oren. Smash that thing to pieces and bring back 10 shards. There are the Tyrants who terrorize the Gludio wasteland. Defeat them and bring back at least 10 claws! Finally, defeat Guardian Basilisk, the so-called "guardian of sterility" in Death Pass and bring back at least 10 of its fangs. If you are a true heir to the power and pride of the Orcs, you should pass this test easily! Go complete your task and return; I will wait for you here. Before you depart, take this Dimension Diamond. You can trade it to the village gatekeeper for something special that may help you on your journey.
